video_dude_1.desc_unlocked: Playback used to work in Hollywood, putting bits of music and video in his pockets and jogging them from house to house, throwing crazy parties.
video_dude_1.title: Video Dude 1

video_dude_2.desc_unlocked: Then he met the Judoka, who taught him how to use code to grab millions of videos at once. The two friends hang out watching Kanye West videos.
video_dude_2.title: Video Dude 2
